amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Salaries and Expenses, General Administration of the Department of Justice by $1 million and increases funding for State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance (veterans treatment courts) by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Salaries and Expenses, General Administration of the Department of Justice by $1 million and to increase funding for State and Local Law Enforcement Assistance(veterans treatment courts) by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brownley (CA) amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
